description: Bergenia 'Abendglocken' is an amazing plant species with elegant, deep-green foliage, unique bell-shaped flowers, and clusters of deep-red buds. It is a low maintenance, hardy evergreen ground cover that looks beautiful throughout all four seasons. The large flowers are white and appear in the spring and early summer, while they are stilled framed by the deep-green foliage. In the autumn and winter, the foliage changes color to shades of bronze, cranberry, and purple, creating an eye-catching landscape. This lustrous and versatile perennial is an ideal choice for any garden.
